CustomField.description: If checked, comma-separated rollup results will be formatted in the form "one, two, and three." If unchecked, rollup results will be formatted as "one, two, three."
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, comma-separated rollup results will be formatted in the form "one, two, and three." If unchecked, rollup results will be formatted as "one, two, three."
CustomField.label: Use Comma-And Delimiter
